entry.title: iPhone XS Max Earpiece Speaker
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Earpiece Speaker
Price: 10.99

Replace a malfunctioning earpiece speaker in your iPhone XS Max and fix problems with phone call audio. This speaker is used to listen while the phone is held to your ear. This speaker is soldered to a flex cable as part of an assembly including the flood illuminator and proximity sensor. Replacing the earpiece speaker part of this assembly requires microsoldering.

entry.title: iPhone XS Max Replacement Battery
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 34.99

This Replacement Battery is what you need to bring that dead iPhone back to life. This battery is brand new! Each one has been tested to confirm that there are no cycles on the cell and that the capacity is 95% or higher.

entry.title: OLED Screen and Digitizer Assembly For iPhone XS Max
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: LCD
Price: 234.99

Looking for an iPhone XS Max screen replacement? If you dropped your Apple iPhone XS Max and broke the front glass it can be repaired!

You can replace your broken Apple iPhone XS Max screen using our high-quality replacement part. Don't hesitate to contact our support team for any questions or concerns.

The OEM Screens for Apple iPhone XS Max OLED Screens and Digitizers has components from original screens. 

For customers who demand the same standard as original repair parts, our parts have you covered.

  • OLED & Digitizer Assembly
  • Touch Digitizer and IC
  • Glass Lens
  • Backlight
  • Flex Cable
  • Lifetime Warranty

Lifetime Warranty

The Replacement Apple iPhone XS Max LCD Screens and Digitizers come with a lifetime warranty, as the other Apple LCD Replacement Parts.

Part Type OLED Screens and Digitizer
Compatible Model iPhone XS Max
Screen Type OLED capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors
Manufacturer Unlockr Parts
Warranty Lifetime Warranty

entry.title: iPhone XS/XS Max Rear Camera
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Other Parts
Price: 87.99

Replace a malfunctioning dual 12 MP rear-facing camera assembly. This assembly is compatible with an iPhone XS or iPhone XS Max smartphone. If your camera has sensor issues, problems focusing, or is malfunctioning, you'll want to replace this part.

entry.title: iPhone XS Max Cell Antenna Feed Flex Cable
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Antenna
Price: 8.99

Replace a torn or damaged cellular antenna feed line cable. This cable connects the logic board to parts of the rear case.

entry.title: iPhone XS Max Button Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Other Part
Price: 7.99 - 9.99 (3 variants)

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.


This set of exterior case buttons includes the Power/Lock Button, Volume Buttons, and the Vibrate/Ring Switch for replacing buttons with cosmetic troubles.These parts only replace the external button faces visible on the outside of the case.The internal switches that do all the work are attached to the internal button cables.

entry.title: iPhone XS Max SIM Card Tray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: SIM Card Tray
Price: 4.99

Important Notice: This item can take 5-10 days to fulfill.


Replace a bent or missing single SIM card tray for an iPhone XS Max. Only the model A2104 for carriers in China uses a dual SIM card tray. This tray holds the nano SIM card and is inserted on the side of the phone.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Front Camera
Price: 3.99

Replace a damaged or missing plastic guide for the front-facing camera lenses and sensors. This plastic guide centers the front-facing camera lenses, the proximity sensor, and the flood illuminator over the openings in the front glass panel.

entry.title: Tempered Glass Screen Protector For iPhone 10 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Tempered Glass
Price: 9.99 - 17.99 (8 variants)

Pack of 10 Tempered Glasses

 

Add an extra layer of protection on your screen of to protect it from scratches and cracking. It is 0.2mm thick at 9H Durability with a 2.5D curve to fit perfectly.

They have an oleophobic coating to make them oil-resistant and prevent fingerprints to ensure perfect image clarity and touch sensitivity.

The 0.2mm thickness and flexibility makes them very easy to apply.

 

Part Type iPhone Tempered Glass
Compatible With iPhone

s:variant.title: iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6S Plus, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 8 Plus
